mapper.select:
select `module` ,id ,operation ,request_uri ,method_name ,request_method ,request_params ,user_agent ,request_ip ,request_address ,request_status ,operator ,error_msg ,create_date from boot_sys_operate_log where del_flag = '0'
and `module` like concat('%',#{qo.module},'%')
and request_status = #{qo.requestStatus}
and ( ${qo.sqlFilter} )
order by create_date desc
